'''''Do You Believe In "Fields"?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Experimental Field Generator]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is most likely a reference to the line "Do you believe in 'gravity'?" from {{w|Jojo's Bizarre Adventure}}.
